title: Map Color
description: Sets the color of the block when rendered to a map. The color is represented as a hex value in the format '#RRGGBB'. May also be expressed as an array of [R, G, B] from 0 to 255. If this component is omitted, the block will not show up on the map.

color.title: Color
color.description: The color is represented as a hex value in the format '#RRGGBB'. May also be expressed as an array of [R, G, B] from 0 to 255.

tint_method.title: Tint Method
tint_method.description: Tint multiplied to the color. Tint method logic varies, but often refers to the 'rain' and 'temperature' of the biome the block is placed in to compute the tint.
